content.rendered:
> ProFace X [P] It is a fully developed version of the profile product line, which is designed to handle all kinds of scenarios. Powered by the ZKTeco CPU dedicated to running the geometric face recognition algorithm and the latest computer vision technology, the profile X [P] supports face and palm verification with large capacity and fast recognition speed, enhancing security performance in all aspects.

The profile X [P] also helps eliminate hygiene concerns; not only because of the contact recognition technology it is equipped with but also because of the identification of the masked individual.
Facial recognition capability has reached a new level in the biometrics technology industry with a maximum of 50,000 face templates, recognition speed of less than 0.3 seconds per face, and maximum anti-plagiarism capability against almost all kinds of fake photos and videos.
In addition, 3-in-1 palm recognition (palm shape, Palm footprint, palm sweat) is performed in 0.35 seconds for each hand; the palm data obtained will be compared with a maximum of 5000 Palm templates.
As mentioned earlier, profile X [P] can help reduce the risk of infection and the spread of germs during the recent global public health problem as well. It enables masked individual identification during face and palm verification at all access points, especially in hospitals, factories, schools, commercial buildings, airports, stations and other public places.

excerpt.rendered:
• Intelligent energy-saving design. Accurate assessment of the distance (up to 2.5 m (8.2 ft)) between the user and the device by the microwave detector before awakening the recognition tip
• 2MP Starlight CMOS sensor camera with WDR function ،
Which enables the device to recognize faces under harsh lighting conditions
(0.5 Lux – 50000 Lux)
• IP68 dustproof, waterproof and ik04 protection standard
• Wide range of working temperature (-30 ~ 60 degrees Celsius , -22 ~ 140 degrees Fahrenheit)
